the visible part of the Sun is not the

of gas that extends for millions of

degrees this coronal gases millions of
degrees logic suggests that the hottest

each layer further out would be cooler
but the corona
spreading out from the sun's surface

the layers below the question is why

up with a daring plan to get the data
needed to answer this question and the
eclipse gives him the perfect
opportunity to put it into action he's
going to fly to NASA WB 57 jets along
the shadow of the Eclipse their
